file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-73-01-04 - MAIN-DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCHES - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN-DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCHES - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the microswitches of the warning system of the main door. B. These procedures are applicable to the four microswitches of the main door. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRSTAIRS MAIN DOOR WARNING MI- ALL 52-73-01-000-801-A CROSWITCHES - REMOVAL AIRSTAIRS MAIN DOOR WARNING MI- ALL 52-73-01-400-801-A CROSWITCHES - INSTALLATION SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR WARNING MI- ALL 52-73-01-000-802-A CROSWITCHES - REMOVAL SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR WARNING MI- ALL 52-73-01-400-802-A CROSWITCHES - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-73-01 Page 1 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-73-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. AIRSTAIRS MAIN DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCHES - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the microswitch of the warning system of the main door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-23-04-000-801-A/400 MAIN-DOOR LINING PANEL - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 811 Main door D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Main door I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open the main door. (2) Remove lining panels ( AMM TASK 25-23-04-000-801-A/400 as applicable). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Disconnect the two splices (2) to disconnect the electrical wires (1). (2) If applicable, cut and remove the tiedown strap (3) to release the electrical wires (1) from the door structure. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-73-01 Page 2 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) If applicable, remove the screw and washer (8) to loosen the clamp (7) that attach the electrical wires (1) to the door structure. (4) Remove the two nuts (4) and screws (6) that attach the microswitch (5). (5) Remove the microswitch (5). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-73-01 Page 3 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Warning Microswitches - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 811 6. SCREW (2) 5. MICROSWITCH 3. TIE DOWN STRAP B 4. NUT C DET. A 1. ELECTRICAL WIRE 2. SPLICE 1. ELECTRICAL WIRE 2. SPLICE 7. CLAMP 4. NUT (2) DET. B 4. NUT (2) (TYP.) 1. ELECTRICAL WIRE 8. SCREW WASHER 2. SPLICE 5. MICROSWITCH 6. SCREW (2) DET. C 6. SCREW (2) 7. CLAMP 5. MICROSWITCH 8. SCREW EM145AMM520023B.DGN WASHER EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-73-01 Page 4 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-73-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. AIRSTAIRS MAIN DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCHES - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the microswitch of the warning system of the main door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-23-04-400-801-A/400 MAIN-DOOR LINING PANEL - INSTALLATION AIRSTAIRS MAIN-DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCH- AMM TASK 52-73-01-700-801-A/500 ES - FUNCTIONAL TEST AIRSTAIRS MAIN-DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCH- AMM TASK 52-73-01-820-801-A/500 ES - ADJUSTMENT C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 811 Main door D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MS3367-4-9 Tiedown strap AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Main door I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the microswitch (5) in its installation position. (2) Install the two screws (6) and nuts (4) to attach the microswitch (5). (3) Connect the electrical wires (1) with the splices (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-73-01 Page 5 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) If applicable, install the tiedown strap (3) to attach the electrical wires (1) to the main door structure. (5) If applicable, install the clamp (7) to attach the electrical wires (1) to the main door structure. Attach with the screw and washer (8). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Do a functional test ( AMM TASK 52-73-01-700-801-A/500) and do an adjustment ( AMM TASK 52-73-01-820-801-A/500), of the warning microswitches of the main door. (2) Install lining panels ( AMM TASK 25-23-04-400-801-A/400 as applicable). (3) Close the main door. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-73-01 Page 6 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-73-01-000-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 4. SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCHES - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the microswitches of the warning system of the side-hinged main door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-23-04-000-801-A/400 MAIN-DOOR LINING PANEL - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 811 Side-hinged main door D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the side-hinged main door available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Side-hinged main door I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) Open the side-hinged main door. (2) Remove lining panels of the side-hinged main door ( AMM TASK 25-23-04-000-801- A/400 as applicable). J. Removal SUBTASK 020-003-A (1) Disconnect the two splices (2) to disconnect the electrical wires (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 52-73-01 Page 7 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Cut and remove the tiedown strap (3) (if applicable). (3) Remove the two nuts (4) and screws (6) that attach the microswitch (5). (4) Remove the microswitch (5). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 52-73-01 Page 8 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Warning Microswitches - Removal/Installation Figure 402 C B A ZONE 811 DET. A 6. SCREW (2) 5. MICROSWITCH 1. ELECTRICAL WIRE FWD 2. SPLICE 4. NUT (2) 3. TIE DOWN STRAP DET. B DET. C 5. MICROSWITCH 6. SCREW (2) 7. CLAMP 8. SCREW WASHER 1. ELECTRICAL WIRE 2. SPLICE 4. NUT (2) 145AMM520236.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 52-73-01 Page 9 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-73-01-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 5. SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCHES - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the microswitches of the warning system of the side-hinged main door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-23-04-400-801-A/400 MAIN-DOOR LINING PANEL - INSTALLATION SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR WARNING MICRO- AMM TASK 52-73-01-700-802-A/500 SWITCHES - FUNCTIONAL TEST SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR WARNING MICRO- AMM TASK 52-73-01-820-802-A/500 SWITCHES - ADJUSTMENT C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 811 Side-hinged main door D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the side-hinged main door available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MS3367-4-9 Tiedown strap AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Side-hinged main door I. Installation SUBTASK 420-003-A (1) Put the microswitch (5) in its installation position. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 52-73-01 Page 10 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Install the two screws (6) and nuts (4) to attach the microswitch (5). (3) Connect the electrical wires (1) with the splices (2). (4) Install the tiedown strap (3) to attach the electrical wires (1) to the side-hinged main door structure (if applicable). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Do a functional test (AMM TASK 52-73-01-700-802-A/500) and do an adjustment (AMM TASK 52-73-01-820-802-A/500), of the warning microswitches of the side- hinged main door. (2) Install lining panels of the side-hinged main door ( AMM TASK 25-23-04-400-801- A/400 as applicable). (3) Close the side-hinged main door. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 52-73-01 Page 11 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
